short_summary: An advance contract award notice for a Traditional Healer Apprentice service requirement in the Okimaw Ohci Healing Lodge and Nekaneet First Nation. The pre-identified supplier must provide Traditional Healing services to the Indigenous offenders and support the work of the Traditional Healers.
description: Provide Traditional Healing services to the Indigenous offenders in the Okimaw Ohci Healing Lodge and Nekaneet First Nation, and support the work of the Traditional Healers. Include specific requirements and responsibilities for the Traditional Healer Apprentice.
